alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A couple of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lauderdale and western Colbert Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Tishomingo State Park, with another strong thunderstorm located 5 miles north-northeast of Waterloo. Both cells were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Waterloo, Malone, Mynot, Mt Hester, Margerum, Allsboro, Maud, Riverton and Wright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
